post:
I am selling my Hostigation 128MB KVM XMAS plan

Here are the specs
 * 128MB memory
 * 5GB disk
 * 500GB transfer

Paid until Dec 22, 2012 so there is still 11month and few days of paid-service left

Tim has been kind enough to let me transfer it to anyone under the following conditions
 * The new owner cannot be an already terminated (for abuse) customer of Hostigation.com
 * No Transfer fees charged by Hostigation

I accept paypal only, PM me to discuss $$
